name: The Cabin (itch) (danknfrshTV)
description:
The Cabin is a dark little interactive picture-book survival horror, set on a snowy night in a cabin in the mountains. You are injured, a monster is chasing you, and you must unlock the secrets of the cabin if you want to survive.  So many ways to die, only one way to live. Make your choices and earn the consequences.

First complete game made on Twine.
